page.topic: Show message on UX component if it has field validation errors
page.description: If any fields have validation errors, show a message on the dialog to indicate that there were errors. Note that if the component uses Panels, and the message is not shown, you should specify a Javascript function to call and write your own handler. Additionally, the client-side 'onFieldValidationError' event will fire if there are any server-side field level validation errors.
